plugin.title: Awesm
plugin.author: Topspin Media
plugin.description: This plugin makes a call to awe.sm's conversion API when passed an awesm=awesm_id parameter in the flashvars.

flashvar.name: position
flashvar.description: Position of the plugin. Can be "over", "left", "right", "top" or "bottom".

flashvar.name: size
flashvar.description: Width or height of the plugin when not over the display.
